General.Name: Devonian Health Group Inc.
General.Description: Devonian Health Group Inc. engages in the development of botanical drugs. Its lead product candidate is Thykamine, completed Phase IIa clinical trial product for the treatment of ulcerative colitis and atopic dermatitis. The company also develops Pantoprazole Magnesium for the treatment of gastric or duodenal ulcers; Cleo-35 for the treatment of hormonal acne in women; and value-added products for dermo-cosmetics. In addition, the company acquires drug and health product licenses; and distributes pharmaceutical products. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Québec, Canada.
General.Address: 360, rue des Entrepreneurs, Québec, QC, Canada, G5V 4T1
